longDescription: The Cauldron of Rebirth, known in Welsh as Pair Dadeni, appears in Celtic mythology as an enormous vessel capable of restoring the dead to life. Unlike ordinary cooking or ritual vessels, this cauldron possesses supernatural properties that transcend the limitations of mortal existence. Its capacity to reverse death itself makes it among the most powerful magical objects in Celtic tradition.
name: Cauldron of Rebirth
primarySources: The Mabinogion. Translated by Sioned Davies. Oxford: Oxford University Press, 2007
The Four Branches of the Mabinogi. Translated by Patrick K. Ford. Berkeley: University of California Press, 1977
Lebor Gabala Erenn: The Book of the Taking of Ireland. Edited by R.A.S. Macalister. Dublin: Irish Texts Society, 1938-1956
